array.filter.body: ${1:filtered}=(`for i in ${${2:myArray}[@]} ; do echo \$i; done | grep ${3:pattern}`)

command.nice.description: run command with desired privilege. n: -20 (highest priority) to 19 (lowest priority)

command.renice.body: for p in \$(pidof "${1:process_name}"); do sudo renice -n ${2|-20,-15,-10,-5,0,5,10,15,19|} -p "\$p"; done
command.renice.description: Change running process priority. n: -20 (highest priority) to 19 (lowest priority)

body: echo `tput sitm``tput dim`-"Change selection: [up/down]  Select: [ENTER]" `tput sgr0`
get_cursor_row()   { IFS=';' read -sdR -p \$'\E[6n' ROW COL; echo \${ROW#*[}; }
key_input()        { read -s -n3 key 2>/dev/null >&2; [[ \$key = \$ESC[A ]] && echo up; [[ \$key = \$ESC[B ]] && echo down; [[ \$key = "" ]] && echo enter; }
fn-fx.fn-options.description: provide a list of options to user and return the index of selected option
